TopicTitle: Launch Clamps cleaner project (cancelled, souce given here for posterity)

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I've made this little plug-in to clean the evil launchclamps which cause issues with some version of KSP (preventing you to switch to another vessel because they "move" ) and with Kerbtown plug-in which doesn't include launch site cleaning.

But as 0.24 make them automatically recovered after some distance, this plug-in is now useless.

Anyway, it may give some hint to people who want to search for part in the active vessel for example. So the source code can be download here.

(This code may not be the best ever so be careful with it, and I don't clean it up).

If anyone would like to have one for use with Kerbtown launchsite on 0.23(.5), I can provide a compiled version of it.

Have fun.

If anyone would like to have one for use with Kerbtown launchsite on 0.23(.5), I can provide a compiled version of it.

I'd take that! Could be usefull until medsouz releases his new version of KerbTown.

Thanks

I'd take that! Could be usefull until medsouz releases his new version of KerbTown.

Thanks

you're welcome.

working on it, will be on add-ons and releases forum.
